entry.title: [SQ] Only know a little on how computers work. But when I code in my limited experie
entry.content:
Only know a little on how computers work. But when I code in my limited experience I have to things perfectly grammatically for the machine to understand.
How does this work at the machine level? Why doesnâ€™t the whole thing crash if a few bits degrade which I assume happens? Is their something that corrects the silicon for errors?
